Class ProgressStepExecutionListener<I,O>

java.lang.Object
com.redis.riot.core.ProgressStepExecutionListener<I,O>
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.batch.core.ItemWriteListener, org.springframework.batch.core.StepExecutionListener, org.springframework.batch.core.StepListener
public class ProgressStepExecutionListener<I,O> extends Object implements org.springframework.batch.core.StepExecutionListener, org.springframework.batch.core.ItemWriteListener
Listener tracking writer or step progress with by a progress bar.
